name: Something spell book
author: jactac
notes:
So after a bit of a grind due to some untimely disconnects I did it with 21 card spell books. Found the grass version to have some pretty brick draws. used magical something as my attacker of choice, has great synergy with fate and the offerings to doom, easy to lock people out of the game for a couple of turns
Skill was grit but it very rarely came up, did a lot of the climb with restart and that was obviously great too
